text: The 2008 Porsche Centre Gold Coast 500 was the seventh 500km race held at Queensland Raceway. It was held on 15 November 2008, and only attracted nine entrants. ==Results== ===Qualifying 1=== Qualifying session 1 was held on Saturday, 15 November, at 10:30am. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%" |- !
